title: [娱乐]? CookedFoodPlus ? —— 让这个世界没有生肉~[全版本]
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 西木凛 于 2015-3-14 16:35 编辑 






Have you ever wanted to get cooked food faster?

Well, this plugin is for you! It's amazing!

This plugin will be up-to-date for every #Bukkit version available.



Description

I really need to make a description of this ?!?

Ok, I'll make it... Well this amazing plugin is used

to get cooked drop when you kill some entities. :D

Isn't that amazing? You'll never need a furnace again!


作者第一句话~我看到后就 ?!? 了,所以~不翻译了

Cooked Drop Entity














Permissions

Cow            ?     cookedfood.cow

Chicken      ?     cookedfood.chicken

Pig             ?     cookedfood.pig

Sheep         ?     cookedfood.sheep

(给了上方权限后击杀该生物直接掉落熟食物)
(给了Sheep的权限后...打羊毛是不掉落羊毛的)
== 注意 == 在1.7.x版本给予 Sheep 的权限服务器会报错！<不会蹦,单纯报错>因为原本是会掉落羊毛却被这插件给弄没了！


Current Version [1.8] 
向 下 兼 容  [ 1 . 7 ] 已 测 试

当 前 版 本 下 载 ? CookedFoodPlus - 1.1 ?
